DataElement.preferredName: Patient Randomization Study Site Instruction Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text response that details study site instructions used in the randomization process.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment._A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted._A message describing how something is to be done.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.
